name: Yoghourt Was Stolen
description:
Not here! Not here! Not here! My yogurt is gone!
My yogurt was stolen by my brother! I have to find it out!
Is it hidden in the cupboard? Still on the bookshelf? Must be under the sofa!
Ah! Where did the younger brother hide? !

Use a variety of different props to hide your sister in various levels to avoid being discovered!
